metadata.title: DPM/FM Dar grieved over Agha Siraj Durraniâ€™s death

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Oct 15 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar, Wednesday, expressed his deep grief over the death of Agha Siraj Khan Durrani, former speaker of Sindh Assembly "Deeply saddened by the passing of Agha Siraj Khan Durrani, former Speaker of the Sindh Assembly - a seasoned parliamentarian and devoted public representative," the DPM/FM posted on his X handle. Dar also prayed to Allah Almighty to grant him the highest place in Jannah and give strength to his family and loved ones to bear this huge loss. https://x.com/MIshaqDar50/status/1978409194148835570
